name: C Language Fundamentals
concept: Learn the general characteristics of C language and basic program structure
objectives: Understand C syntax, data types, variables, and basic program structure. Learn compilation process and basic input/output operations.

name: Functions & Scope
concept: Master functions, parameter passing, and variable scope in C
objectives: Learn function definition, declaration, and calling. Understand local vs global variables, scope rules, and parameter passing by value and reference.

name: Arrays & Strings
concept: Work with arrays and string manipulation in C
objectives: Master array declaration, initialization, and manipulation. Learn string handling functions and character array operations.

name: Pointers & Memory
concept: Understand pointers, memory management, and dynamic allocation
objectives: Master single and double pointers, pointer arithmetic, and their practical applications. Learn memory allocation and deallocation.

name: Control Structures
concept: Master control flow statements and conditional logic
objectives: Learn if-else, switch, for, while, and do-while statements. Practice nested structures and complex conditional logic.

name: Basic Algorithms
concept: Implement fundamental algorithms and data manipulation
objectives: Master insertion, deletion, searching (linear and binary), sorting algorithms, and basic data structure operations.

name: Data Structures
concept: Implement and use basic data structures
objectives: Learn stack, queue, and linked list operations. Practice implementing basic data structure operations and algorithms.

name: Complete Programs
concept: Build complete C programs combining all learned concepts
objectives: Integrate all learned concepts to create complex, real-world C programs. Practice project organization and advanced programming techniques.
